results.title: Mechanical Engineer HVAC
results.description: A reputable firm is seeking a Mechanical Engineer specialising in HVAC services, to join their team based in Gauteng. Candidates must hold a BEng in Mechanical Engineering and have a minimum of 7 12 years experience. In order to be considered for this vacancy, candidates must be professionally registered with ECSA. Extensive experience working on building services is required for this vacancy.
